name: Shooty Buildy
description:
What is this

Search For a Star Submission by Martynas Antipenkovas.

"Shooty Buildy" is a challenge-based game. It contains several levels, that have different sets of guns, enemies, buildable objects and arena sizes.

And because level completions are timed, you automatically earn bragging rights!

Gameplay gif! Controls

WASD For movement.

Mouse for moving the camera.

LMB for shooting at your annoying enemies!

Spacebar to jump and even double jump!

Game flow

Pick one of the available levels.  If allowed build structures to gain an advantage in the playing field. Survive and eliminate your enemies in the fastest time possible!

Falling off the arena will end the level :'(

Note

The games stores a binary file (game.save) which contains a save data of your game, this can be found in AppData\LocalLow\Game by MAE\Shooty Buildy folder.

Gameplay gif! x2
